alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 12:20PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Gulf, Bay, southwestern Calhoun and south central Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 100 PM EDT/NOON CDT/... At 1220 PM EDT/1120 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Lynn Haven to Panama City to 9 miles south of Tyndall Air Force Base. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Southport, Allanton, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, College Station, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Overstreet, Gainer Spring and Bennett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Washington
